mention.text: 16 nov 89 -- the human rights promotion and protection secretariat of the fmln
the human rights promotion and protection secretariat of the fmln
the human rights promotion and protection secretariat
the priests who manage the jose simeon canas catholic university
julia ramos and her 15-year-old daughter , elva ramos
the same ones who ordered pilots , artillery men , and machinegunners in planes to attack the civilian population
the persons who ordered the horrible murder of the jesuits and three salvadoran citizens
the same ones who are against reaching a political solution to the salvadoran conflict
